wordGroup: environmental geology 环境地质，环境地质学
quaternary geology 第四纪地质学

sentences.en: We went on a geology field trip.
sentences.cn: 我们去进行地质野外考察。

sentences.en: He was visiting professor of geology at the University of Georgia.
sentences.cn: 他曾是佐治亚大学的地质学客座教授。

sentences.en: At first he studied architecture, but later he switched to geology.
sentences.cn: 起初他学建筑，但后来转到地质学。
